plot: Called "Venice of the East" due to its labyrinth of canals, Bangkok displays a rich history and imperial culture. View examples of ancient monumental art and architecture, including the colossal reclining Buddha, and some offshore islands.
title: Thailand
plot_es: Called "Venice of the East" due to its labyrinth of canals, Bangkok displays a rich history and imperial culture. View examples of ancient monumental art and architecture, including the colossal reclining Buddha, and some offshore islands.
plot_en: Called "Venice of the East" due to its labyrinth of canals, Bangkok displays a rich history and imperial culture. View examples of ancient monumental art and architecture, including the colossal reclining Buddha, and some offshore islands.
